channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping is a nuisance on the corner of Brackley Avenue, 22nd December
item.description:
This has become an ongoing issue with people flytipping at the corner of Brackley Avenue/Linden Grove. As soon as rubbish is picked up, people are dumping more. Please do something about this. The issue seems to be getting worse since the council started charging for rubbish collection.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Linden Grove, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter everywhere, 22nd December
item.description:
Litter everywhere. This continues all on Blackwall lane and outside the abandoned brewery. This is a constant issue and becoming a disgrace.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mauritius Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Norwood Road SE27 9AA outside 378 (empty shop) /, 22nd December
item.description:
Norwood Road SE27 9AA outside 378 (empty shop) / 380 (RSPCA shop) road northbound. Couple of small holes in main carriageway (red arrowed) and another / poor surface next to curb (yellow arrows) – latter pedestrian crossing plus where cyclists commonly travel. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture, map pin and Google Street View link: Https://www.google.com/maps/@51.433652,-0.1037193,3a,33.8y,6.59h,70.82t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1s8i38rCg-FRtEdZHQAGp_EA!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D19.175627337089594%26panoid%3D8i38rCg-FRtEdZHQAGp_EA%26yaw%3D6.588061940046756!7i16384!8i8192?entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MTIwOS4wIKXMDSoKLDEwMDc5MjA2N0gBUAM%3D

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 378, Norwood Road, West Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Roots lifting pavement and in the drive, 22nd December
item.description:
Tree Roots coming under the pavement and drive and lifting patio on my property. Patio lifting for a year and getting worse. Tree needs pruning as well. Roots may come under my house and damage the foundation
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gundulph Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Plassey Place concrete seating : seat lintel displaced to block pavement, 22nd December
item.description:
Plassey Place concrete seating : seat lintel displaced to block pavement - eyesore, trip hazard and loss of public seating facility Originally reported 06.10.24 over a year ago FMS report 6558407 but never acknowledged or actioned This is how it should be before the damage Https://www.instantstreetview.com/@51.450046,0.054172,283.96h,-28.74p,1z,khoOPsGJjEBtplOEERkIOg Thank you See photographs taken this afternoon

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Passey Place, Eltham

item.title: Large road sign outside Crown pubhas been turned by vehicle impact to face pavement not road, 22nd December
item.description:
Large road sign outside Crown pub has been turned by vehicle impact to face pavement not road. Needs turning 90 degrees to face road as now not visible to road traffic. See photograph, For avoidance of doubt it is this sign: Https://www.instantstreetview.com/@51.466674,0.00757,262.2h,3.7p,2.7z,VtYeMN1s7UV87hNIoRFOBA

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 45, Tranquil Vale, Blackheath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thurlow Park Road SE21 outside number 10 (T, 22nd December
item.description:
Thurlow Park Road SE21 outside number 10 (Thurlow House) is a metal street name board (with the street name plastic vinyl mostly removed) which has been graffiti tagged. Although Thurlow Park Road comes under TfL Lambeth is responsible for all street name boards (and direction signs) so your property = you clean graffiti. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for report map pin & picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Tulse Hill, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
